channel.title: Legals on Carbon Slash
channel.description: Recent content in Legals on Carbon Slash

item.description:
Cookie Policy

Effective Date: November 15, 2025

Last Updated: November 15, 2025

This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how Carbon Slash uses them on our website. This policy is provided in line with the Kenya Data Protection Act, 2019, which requires that we obtain explicit consent for the processing of Personal Data collected via tracking technologies.

1. What are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. They help the website function efficiently and provide us with anonymized data on how the Site is used.

Privacy Policy

Effective Date: November 15, 2025

Last Updated: November 15, 2025

This Privacy Policy describes how Carbon Slash (the Data Controller), in compliance with the Kenya Data Protection Act, 2019 (DPA), collects, uses, and shares information about you when you visit our website.

1. Information We Collect

We collect information directly from you and automatically as you use the Site. The legal basis for processing your data is primarily Consent (for subscriptions) and Legitimate Interests (for site security and analytics).

Terms of Service

Effective Date: November 15, 2025

Last Updated: November 15, 2025

Welcome to Carbon Slash. These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your use of the Carbon Slash online magazine and its content. By accessing or using the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms and acknowledge the application of Kenyan laws.

1. Acceptance and Agreement

By accessing and using the Site, you agree to be bound by these Terms, which constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Carbon Slash.
